story.title: Our Story
story.content:
Loza Mount Gerizim was born from a deep love for tradition and quality. We produce traditional products using ancient methods, while preserving authenticity and original flavors.

about.title: About Har Grizim Marketing
about.content:
Har Grizim Marketing is a business for marketing and selling high-quality and premium products, including alcohol products, manufactured in Har Bracha and the Gerizim area, with emphasis on quality, tradition and selected raw materials.

The website serves as an online sales platform for private customers in Israel only.

All purchases on the site are intended for ages 18 and over only, in accordance with the law.

Contact Details:
Business Name: Har Grizim Marketing
Address: Har Bracha - Gerizim - Israel
Phone: 0522824170

shipping.title: Shipping Policy and Delivery Times
shipping.israelOnly: Shipments are made within Israel only.
shipping.deliveryTime: Estimated delivery time: 3-7 business days from order confirmation and full payment.
shipping.businessDays: Business days do not include Fridays, Saturdays, holiday eves and holidays.
shipping.deliveryNote: Delivery times are estimated only and do not constitute a commitment.

returns.title: Cancellations and Returns Policy
returns.consumerLaw: This policy is subject to the provisions of the Consumer Protection Law, 1981.
returns.cancellationRight: The customer is entitled to cancel a transaction within 14 days from the date of receiving the product or from the date of placing the order - whichever is later.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.whatText: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience and allow certain features to function properly.
cookies.typesText: We use essential cookies (required for the website to function), analytics cookies (to understand how you use our site), and preference cookies (to remember your settings and preferences).
cookies.thirdPartyText: We may use third-party services such as Google Analytics that place cookies on your device. These services have their own privacy policies governing their use of information.
cookies.managingText: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of our website.
cookies.consentText: By continuing to use our website, you consent to our use of cookies as described in this policy. You can withdraw your consent at any time by adjusting your browser settings.

accessibility.title: Accessibility Statement
accessibility.commitmentText: Loza Mount Gerizim is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We are continually improving the user experience for everyone and applying relevant accessibility standards.
accessibility.featuresText: Our website includes features such as keyboard navigation, screen reader compatibility, clear heading structure, sufficient color contrast, and resizable text to enhance accessibility.
accessibility.complianceText: We aim to conform to the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA standards. These guidelines explain how to make web content more accessible for people with disabilities.
accessibility.improvementsText: We regularly review our website to identify and fix accessibility issues. We welcome feedback and are committed to making continuous improvements to ensure our site is accessible to all users.
accessibility.contactText: If you encounter any accessibility barriers or have suggestions for improvement, please contact us at info@lozamountgerizim.com or call 052-273-8783. We will work to resolve the issue promptly.

warranty.title: Warranty Policy
warranty.intro: Har Grizim Marketing makes every effort to provide its customers with quality and proper products.
warranty.scope: Warranty for products sold on the site applies in accordance with the provisions of Israeli law and in accordance with the manufacturer's warranty, if any.
warranty.coverage: The warranty covers defects caused by faulty manufacturing or malfunction that is not the result of unreasonable use, negligence, natural wear, or use not in accordance with instructions.
warranty.exclusions: The warranty does not apply to damages caused by incorrect use, improper storage, dropping, breakage, water damage, or any modification or repair made by an unauthorized party.
warranty.defectiveProduct: In case of a defective product, the customer should contact the business as soon as possible and provide full details, including a description of the malfunction and proof of purchase.
warranty.remedies: After examining the product, and at the business's discretion, one of the following options will be provided: product repair, replacement, or monetary credit - in accordance with the law.
warranty.limitation: The warranty applies to the product only and does not include indirect or consequential damages of any kind.
warranty.conditions: Exercise of the warranty is conditional on presenting proof of purchase and reasonable use of the product.
